Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 36-2009. A 23-year-old 
man with cough, hoarseness, and abnormalities on chest imaging.
Choy E(1), Digumarthy SR, Koplin SA.

Author information:
(1)Division of Medical Oncology, Department of Medicine, Massachusetts General 
Hospital, USA.

Comment in
    N Engl J Med. 2010 Mar 11;362(10):961; author reply 961. doi: 
10.1056/NEJMc0912411.
